lead_paragraph: The capricious nature of road racing revealed itself on Rio's perilous Olympic course again on Sunday as Anna van der Breggen took gold after a horror crash for a teammate and American Mara Abbott was cruelly denied a medal.

headline.print_headline: Cycling: Joy and Pain for Dutch as Van Der Breggen Wins Gold
headline.main: Cycling: Joy and Pain for Dutch as Van Der Breggen Wins Gold

snippet: The capricious nature of road racing revealed itself on Rio's perilous Olympic course again on Sunday as Anna van der Breggen took gold after a horror crash for a teammate and American Mara Abbott was cruelly denied a medal....
